title: Black Champion load screen
body: I go through the queue and get into a game and then everyone selects champions and all is still fine until the loading screen appears and all i get is a black screen that doesnt go away for hours. I have checked my firewall and this is not the issue so i am dumbfounded as to what is causing this. Please help

replies.body:
Black loading screens after champ select are often caused by a poor connection to the game servers. When the client isn't able to connect to the game servers, it won't be able to call up players that are in the match and can crash the client entirely. While there are a lot of potential causes here, our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common solutions for this. 

Please let me know if you continue to have problems after working through the guide.
